source.en: Blaser, Magdalena "Myths of the Cofán people"

sentences.text: Fae a'ija tsampini jacamba unjinga indiye.
Singu'ccu otafanga tuiyepa tssipa.
Tsa'caen tssipajipa tsaoñasian'jen.
Tsaoñasian nanimba can'nimba sange ccutsu.
Unjin quia'me tuisi sange ccutsu.
Tsa'caen ccutsu'ni singu'ccu tsosine dun, dun, qquen jenjen.
Tsa'caen jensi jongoesu tsu ya'caenda jen qque asi'ttaen cutsu.
Tsomba tsa a'ija in'jan singu'ccu'su cocoya tsu somboye tson'jen qquen in'jamba junde tssatssavo'jin setsaccunga can'ni eje.
Tsomba tisu matichima isupa caña'jen.
Tsa'caen caña'jeni findiosi tsa canjansi ain qque suqque'suja somboji.
Tsa'caen sombojisi caña'jeni sombopa tise atse'fai'ccu mappi'ñacca jipa tssatssavo'jin setsama mappi indi.
Tsa'caen mappi indipa qquitssa osaen qquen tson.
Tsonsi dyopa caña'jen tssatssavo'jin osaisa'ne tise matichi'ccu atui chattu findiosi atse'fama.
Tsa'caen chattusi findiosija anttepanshan singu'ccunga ja.
Tsa'ma tise atse'faja toe'tti oya'oya ccui.
Tsa'caen tsomba tsa a'ija dyopa tisu tsaoni buttopa ja.
Tsa'caen dapa japa cca'inga candase.
Condasepa su: Findiosi cocoyanga gi indiyepa pa'ma ccushapa ji'ya.
Qquen susi cca'ija japa can'ga'fa.
Tsomba tsu condase'fa tisu'pa atte'choma.
Tsa ta tsu capuchinondeccu can'jen'chombe pporotsse.
Tsa singu'ccuta tsu na'embe tsutoni'su singu'ccu.
